event.title: was separated from the municipality of Ål in 1877

data.event: The area of Hol was separated from the municipality of Ål in 1877 to become a separate municipality.

event.title: was transferred from Uvdal to Hol in 1944

data.event: The area of Dagali was transferred from Uvdal to Hol in 1944.
In 1962 Uvdal was reunited with Nore to form the new municipality of Nore og Uvdal.
